page.title: 16Buildings in Ripe
page.content: Diamond Cottage, in the centre of Ripe, is early 19C with grey headers and red brick dressings on the front and diamond ornamentations. Next door Burton Cottage, Ripe butchers and stores is C17 or earlier timber-framed building. Chipps Cottage and Pelham Cottage are 19C stuccoed. The Old Cottage is 17C timber-framed house with herring-boned brick mogging. Pepperham a timber-framed house refaced with red brick and grey headers. Behind Main Street is Starrs Barn C17 timber framed and ready for conversion into a house. In Chalvington Lovers Farm is a C17 timber-framed house with plaster infilling.Lovers Farmhouse C18 with 2 storeys is built in brick. Church Farmhouse C17 is L-shaped faced with red brick. The Gryphon crest of the Duke family of Laughton Lodge on door.
